sentences.en: All is concord in the woods.
sentences.cn: 森林里一切都和睦相处.

sentences.en: Both lived in Concord, stirred by the same impulses.
sentences.cn: 两人都住在康考德,出于同样的冲动而情不可遏.

sentences.en: Concord can fly the Atlantic in only three hours.
sentences.cn: 协和式飞机飞越大西洋只需3小时.

sentences.en: Concord inaugurated a new era in airplane travel.
sentences.cn: 协和飞机开创了空中旅行的新纪元.

sentences.en: Errors in the descriptions of various CONCORD ships have been resolved.
sentences.cn: 大量统合部船只的错误描述被修正.

sentences.en: Gentleman's valise and hot water to Concord.
sentences.cn: 把先生的箱子、还有热水送去.

sentences.en: He spent rest of his life ( unmarried ) in vicinity of Concord.
sentences.cn: 他终身未娶,后来一直住在康考德附近.

sentences.en: living in concord with neighbouring states
One day we shall all live in peace, concord and union.
sentences.cn: 有一天我们将生活在和平, 和谐和团结之中.

sentences.en: Ralph Waldo Emerson, the leader of the Transcendentalists, moved to Concord where he met Thoreau.
sentences.cn: “先验论”者的领袖雷尔夫·瓦尔德 、 爱默生迁到康考特后,与索洛结识.

sentences.en: The root for this development lies in the evolution of CONCORD itself.
sentences.cn: 这些发展都根基于CONCORD本身的演变.

sentences.en: The two tribes lived in concord.
Their inadequacy brings us back to the general inadequacy of the literary world of Concord.
sentences.cn: 它们的不足应归咎子康考德文艺界的贫乏.

sentences.en: They expressed the hope that he would pursue a neutral and balanced policy for the sake of national concord.
sentences.cn: 他们希望他能为国家的和谐而追求一种中立而平衡的政策。

sentences.en: They were there to take part in a ritual act of concord.
sentences.cn: 他们在此参加这个友好的仪式.

sentences.en: Which bus should I take from here to the Concord Hotel?
sentences.cn: 从这里去协和旅馆应该坐哪一路车?

words.tran_cn: 和谐的；协调的；一致的；和声的
调和，一致；用语索引；著作或作家全集的重要用字索引

trans.tran_en: the state of having a friendly relationship, so that you agree on things and live in peace
